name: The Horror Season
description:
A police officer decides to investigate this 'haunted' farm...

The story starts with the police officer getting out of the car and noticing that his car key has been taken.  The police officer has no weapons or radio backup, so he's left on the farm to try and escape.

The police officer has no choice but to start an investigation on the farm, though out discovering the owner has some weird obsessions with sheep's! the police officer keeps his guard up to take the farm owner or whatever it is... 

Your challenge is to help the officer investigate the farm by finding hidden things, and figuring out puzzles along the way....   You might even interact with the farm owner yourself! ???

Do you want to interstage this farm and have a good challenge?   YES  well, download The Horror Season Now!!!

INSTRUCTIONS
  1. Download the game file,
  2. Extract the game and open the folder,
  3. Double-click on "HorrorEngine.exe" and play.
  4. If "Windows Protected Your PC" pops up click "more info"
  5. Click "Run Anyway"
